text:
copy
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Sent for the information of
Harry J. Skornla
14 GREGORY HAUL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
January 2, 1958
Mr, Raymond D, Cheydleur
Station WF3U-FM
Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Rays
My most sincere thanks for all that you did as chairman
of the i'iASB Research Committee in 1957* 1 really do appreciate
the hard work youfve ut in, and I am impressed with the
results. Coleman gave this committee a good post-war start;
you continued it most ably; and I know that Sara Becker will
take it from here* Fortunately, you will stay on the
committee to give it continuity.
I have noted the recommendation for a full time research
director, and will put it on the agenda of the next meeting
of the Foundation Committee, which should meet within the
next few weeks to draw up our foundation requests for the
period July 1, 1958 through June 30, 1959*
NAKB depends for its growth on hard-working people like
you! Thank you for everything.
With best wishes for a Happy Hew Year,
Yours sincerely.
Burton Paulu
President
BPtds
CCJ Harry J. Skornla
Jack McBride
